description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Bugs
NETWORKNET-33578 - Discrepancies in TextBody and HtmlBody property
NETWORKNET-33580 - Extracting Attachments from Calendar in Aspose.Email is not working properly
NETWORKNET-33600 - MSG (class IPM.Schedule.Meeting.Request) to EML
NETWORKNET-33604 - Problem with FROM field having Hebrew characters after conversion from EML to MSG
NETWORKNET-33607 - Exception: Invalid URI when loading MapiMessage.FromMailMessage
NETWORKNET-33608 - Memory Leak in Mail Printer
NETWORKNET-33610 - Saving messages as EML from PST gives empty recepients
NETWORKNET-33617 - PST created with Aspose.Email: Marking multiple messages Read/Unread
NETWORKNET-33609 - PersonalStorage creates Empty recipients
NETWORKNET-33616 - PST: Attachment size not displayed next to Attachment name in Outlook
NETWORKNET-33584 - Getting real Mail Recipient by parsing PR_TRANSPORT_MESSAGE_HEADERS
NETWORKNET-33602 - EWS - Retrieving messages using message's UniqueId
summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
